body_html:
So instead of training a tree and getting something, can you hardcode the tree you want to receive
Like this

tree_ensemble_config = boosted_trees_pb2.TreeEnsemble()
text_format.Merge(
"""
trees {
nodes {
leaf {
scalar: 15
}
}
}
tree_weights: 0.1
tree_metadata: {
num_layers_grown: 0}
""", tree_ensemble_config)

 and then write it to the checkpoint under the appropriate name
